sentences.en: A muscle tear will leave a scar after healing.
sentences.cn: 肌肉撕裂复原后会留下疤痕。

sentences.en: Any local diminution of blood supply will delay or prevent healing.
sentences.cn: 任何局部供血的减少将延迟或阻碍愈合.

sentences.en: Aunt Polly paused, perplexed, and Tom looked for healing pity.
sentences.cn: 波莉姨妈住了手,愣了一会儿, 汤姆指望她会讲些好话哄他.

sentences.en: Broadly, it makes connections between ideas about healing and how they link to plants.
sentences.cn: 笼统说来，它将治疗理念和如何与医疗设备相结合联系了起来。

sentences.en: Dogs were also associated with healing in the ancient world.
sentences.cn: 在古代，狗也与治病有关。

sentences.en: His art of healing is remarkable.
His wounds are healing up [ over ].
sentences.cn: 他的伤口正在 痊愈.

sentences.en: Many men and even women are very judgmental of the need to talk about problems because they have never experienced how healing it can be.
sentences.cn: 许多男人，甚至女人，都把谈论问题的需要视为很严肃、正经的事，因为他们不知该怎么治疗这种需要。

sentences.en: Mare and most of all from the founder and director, Marie: I am praying like crazy for you that your graft took and all is healing 100% well.
sentences.cn: 还有，最最重要的，来自创办人和董事，玛丽：我由衷企求你所接受的治疗，以及其他所有的都100%有疗效。祝你好运，我的灵魂与你同在。

sentences.en: Persistent damage or inadequate healing may lead to chronic lameness.
sentences.cn: 反复受伤或治疗不当可导致长期跛足。

sentences.en: She seems to have a vocation for healing.
sentences.cn: 看来她具备治病救人的才能.

sentences.en: The cut on my finger is healing well.
sentences.cn: 我手指上的伤口愈合得很好.

sentences.en: The dominant components of the healing process are epithelization.
sentences.cn: 愈合过程的主要组成部分,是上皮形成.

sentences.en: There is rest and healing in the contemplation of antiquities.
sentences.cn: 欣赏古物有休息和疗养之功.

sentences.en: They are transfigured by the healing powers of art.
sentences.cn: 他们因艺术的治疗效力而面貌一新。

words.tran_cn: 医治者（尤指用宗教迷信方式给人治病的人）；治疗物；治病术士

phrases.tran_cn: 创伤修复，愈合；伤口愈合

trans.tran_en: the process of becoming healthy and strong again

trans.tran_cn: （使）愈合( heal的现在分词 )，治愈，（使）结束，较容易忍受
